HTML is the standard markup language for Web pages.
With HTML you can create your own Website.
HTML is easy to learn - You will enjoy it!

With our "Try it Yourself" editor, you can edit the HTML code and view the 
result:
Click on the "Try it Yourself" button to see how it works.

In this HTML tutorial, you will find more than 200 examples. With our online 
"Try it Yourself" editor, you can edit and test each example yourself!
Go to HTML Examples!
Many chapters in this tutorial end with an exercise where you can check your level of knowledge.
See all HTML Exercises
Test your HTML skills with our HTML Quiz!
Start HTML Quiz!
Sign Up for Free
Note:This is an optional feature. You can study at W3Schools without creating an account.

At W3Schools you will find complete references about HTML elements, 
attributes, events, color names, entities, character-sets, URL encoding, 
language codes, HTTP messages, browser support, and more:
Get certified by completingthecourse

Code 
                            websites directly in the browser withW3Schools Spaces

h6.text: No credit card required.
W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and SSL certificate.
Buy a domain or transfer an existing one and connect it to your space.
All at your fingertips with our easy-to-usecode editor
Cloud-Based
No installation required. Access everything in your browser. Get started in seconds.
File Navigator
Find and switch easily between your code files without leaving the code editor.
Terminal and Log
Monitor your code, debug and troubleshoot your work during the development process.
Database
Find and preview all the data stored in your website. Anytime, from anywhere.
Environment Manager
Control your website access points to establish secure connections.
Package Manager
Search and install frameworks and libraries in just one click.
User Analytics
Learn from your website visitors to deliver a better user experience.
Cancel anytime.

Coding Skills
AI Tutor
Websites
Securely
By subscribing to a plan you support the W3Schools mission to makelearning available to everyone - no matter their background.
$0/Forever
This is for you that are beginning to explore coding and web development
$14.99/Month
This is for you that want to learn and reach your goals faster. Build fullstack projects, ad free experience.
For teachers
Spend less time on admin tasks while engaging your students. Help them learn, practice and collaborate. All in one place.
You can also buy a domain or connect an existing one.
Just landed inSpaces
Learn to code more effectivelyand intelligently with kAI - AI tutor
Hi! I'm kAI, W3Schools AI Tutor...
Feel free to ask me any coding-related questions, and I'll do my best to assist you.
I can help you checking your code for errors, improving your code's structure, explaining coding concepts in a clear and understandable way, and more...
I can even create complete websites for you based on your input, so what are you waiting for?
Cloud-based
Terminal & Log
How To Libraries
Database
File Navigator

Analytics
Environment Manager
With Basic Spaces, you can build frontend websites. Whereas with Fullstack Spaces, you can build frontend and backend websites.
Basic Spaces include HTML, CSS, and Javascript. Full Stack Spaces include everything in Basic Spaces plus PHP, Python, React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Handlebars, and Django.
Your subscription will be automatically renewed every month.
Your access to all the benefits for the paid period of time will continue. However, the subscription will not be renewed automatically.
To subscribe W3Schools accounts for multiple users, you can contact sales@w3schools.com
If you want to use W3Schools services as an educational institution, team or enterprise, send us an e-mail:sales@w3schools.com
If you want to report an error, or if you want to make a suggestion, send us an e-mail:help@w3schools.com

Contact us about W3Schools Academy for educational
                      institutions
Contact us about W3Schools Academy for your organization
About sales:sales@w3schools.comAbout errors:help@w3schools.com
Supporting teachers, helping students

Focus on what you do best: teaching.
          Everything is structured and easy to manage, so you spend less time organizing and more time guiding your students.
No switching between platforms.
Track student progress and identify learning gaps.
No installations, no complicated setup.
Suits both beginners and experienced teachers.

We know you already manage multiple platforms,
              LMS tools, communication apps, tracking systems,
              homework platforms, and digital textbooks.

W3Schools Academy makes it easier to teach coding by keeping 
              everything in one place. No extra software, no complicated setup.
We know you already manage multiple platforms. LMS tools, communication apps, tracking systems, homework platforms, and digital textbooks.

W3Schools Academy makes it easier to teach coding by keeping 
              everything in one place. No extra software, no complicated setup.
Students get access to all W3Schools certification exams.Each exam is automatically graded, giving you a clearoverview of your students' progress without extra work.
Certificates are a great way for studentsto prove their skills and add somethingvaluable to their portfolio.

From the first lesson to the final exam, students progress through structured courses,
          hands-on challenges, and certification exams, building real skills and staying focused.
Tutorials that break down coding concepts into manageable parts, making them easy to understand.
Students can see what they've completed and what's next, making it easier to stay on track.
Coding challenges and projects help them explore, experiment, and apply what they learn.
When students pass the final exam, they earn a certificate that proves their skills.

With W3Schools Spaces, students can build and test projects directly in the browser, no setup required. It's
        an easy way for students to apply their skills, experiment with code, and share their work with others.
Students can build projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and more.
Students can choose from over 75 templates or customize their own.
Students can build websites, web apps, or fullstack solutions.
Track student progress, manage assignments, and get real-time insights.
Save time with ready-made study plans or customize them to fit your classroom.
Practice with challenges and projects, working alone or in teams. Use the library or create your own.
Ready-made courses and tutorials, to keep learning structured and up to date.
For building websites and applications. Code, test, and deploy. Easy to use, no setup required.
Assess student skills with exams and certifications, giving them proof of their achievements.
Keeping up with new technologies isn't always easy. New frameworks and languages appear all the time, and it can feel overwhelming on top of your work in the classroom.
We're here to help you stay confident and up to date with best practices, so you can explore coding concepts at your own pace before introducing them to your students.
W3Schools Academy is designed for education, not data collection.Schools and organizations can trust that student information is protected.
Student data is not used for marketing or sold to third parties.
We only collect what's necessary for learning, nothing more.
Complies with GDPR, FERPA, COPPA, and other regulations to keep student data safe.
Teachers and students own their content and can request access or deletion at any time.
Includes encryption, secure access controls, and regular security updates.
We are transparent about how we use data and provide tools for managing privacy.
Founder & CEO in Otic Foundation
We chose W3Schools Academy because of its proven ability to deliver high-quality education. With clear, concise, and interactive tutorials, W3Schools makes learning accessible to everyone.
Co-Founder in Boolean Girl

Boolean Girl was looking for a single platform to teach Python and Web development to students. We already used W3Schools as a reference platform in our teaching so it made sense to also use the development environment.
Head of Adult Education in LearnTech

W3Schools classroom solution allows students to complete the courses, and our tutors to monitor progress, set goals and provide support where needed. We recommend this classroom tool with W3Schools courses.
For over 25 years, W3Schools has been a trusted resource for coding education. While other platforms cover many subjects, we focus only on programming.
Our courses, challenges, and exams are designed to help students build real coding skills, making it easier for teachers to create structured and engaging lessons.
Minimum 10 students and 3-month commitment required
We're here to help!Fill out the form, and our team will reach out to you as soon as possible.
By sending this form you agree to ourTerms of ServiceandPrivacy Policy
Your form has been sent successfully!
Your form could not be saved. Please try again.
W3Schools has been a trusted resource for millions of learners worldwide.
With a global reach and decades of experience,we provide you a platform that supports both teachers and students.
Yes. Each student gets their own W3Schools login. If a student already has an account, they can continue to use it.
No. You only need a browser and internet connection.
Yes. You can make individual adjustments as you see fit for your students.
Yes. You can track student activity, results, and progress in real time.
Yes. The teachers can give manual feedback through messages in their classroom. Students get automatic feedback by the system for code challenges and quizzes.
Yes. You can add other teachers or admins to the same class.
Yes. Students can log in anytime and work from anywhere, at their own pace.
Yes. You can schedule certification exams. Students get three attempts and receive a W3Schools certificate if they pass.
The price is $5.99 per student per month. Minimum 10 students and 3 months required.
When a student license expires, you need to renew it to keep access. The student's data is saved and not deleted.
Yes. We comply with GDPR and other international privacy laws. Student data is never sold or used for marketing.
If you want to use W3Schools services as an educational institution, team or enterprise, send us an e-mail:sales@w3schools.com
If you want to report an error, or if you want to make a suggestion, send us an e-mail:help@w3schools.com

recommendations: Title is too short, aim for 30-60 characters
Add a meta description
Add a meta robots tag
Improve heading hierarchy structure
Improve text to HTML ratio, aim for at least 15%
Improve keyword usage in title, headings, and content
Add descriptive alt text to more images
Consider adding multimedia content for engagement
Add structured data like Schema.org markup
Reduce page size to improve load speed
Too many external links may dilute page authority
Add canonical tag to prevent duplicate content issues
Add hreflang tags if targeting multiple languages/regions

meta_og_tags.og:title: W3Schools.com
meta_og_tags.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

h2.text: Learn from proven tutorials used by millions of learners!

h3.text: Our platform has been used by learners for over 23 years, with a continuously growing audience of learners and constantly updated and improved learning material!
CodeWebsites directly in the browser - No setup required
Have some questions?Visit our support page

About sales:sales@w3schools.comAbout errors:help@w3schools.com
By subscribing to a plan you support the W3Schools mission to makelearning available to everyone - no matter their background.
$0/Forever
This is for you that are beginning to explore coding and web development
$14.99/Month
This is for you that want to learn and reach your goals faster. Build fullstack projects, ad free experience.
For teachers
Spend less time on admin tasks while engaging your students. Help them learn, practice and collaborate. All in one place.
Sign Up For Free
Read More
Check outour plans hereto view the difference.
Your subscription will be automatically renewed every month.
Your access to all the benefits for the paid period of time will continue, however the subscription will not be renewed automatically.
To subscribe W3Schools accounts for multiple users, you can contact sales@w3schools.com
Subscribe for $14.99/month
Cancel anytime.
If you want to use W3Schools services as an educational institution, team or enterprise, send us an e-mail:sales@w3schools.com
If you want to report an error, or if you want to make a suggestion, send us an e-mail:help@w3schools.com

recommendations: Title may be truncated in search results, consider shortening
Add a meta description
Add a meta robots tag
Improve heading hierarchy structure
Improve text to HTML ratio, aim for at least 15%
Include main keywords in the H1 heading
Aim for keyword density between 1.5-2.5% for primary keywords
Add descriptive alt text to more images
Consider adding multimedia content for engagement
Add structured data like Schema.org markup
Use preconnect/dns-prefetch for external domains
Reduce page size to improve load speed
Too many external links may dilute page authority
Add canonical tag to prevent duplicate content issues
Add hreflang tags if targeting multiple languages/regions
